Hi <@U07ND86URS6>, thank you! This is the error: “Authorization failed because you don’t have permission to authorize the scopes required by the app. Please contact your super admin to get the necessary permission.”

It seems that only the super admin can use the app. However, I know about at least one user that wasn’t a super admin and was able to use it a few months ago.

What scopes are you requiring for your app? HubSpot also has optional scopes and conditional scopes. The scopes are directly tied to the HubSpot tier for e.g. `custom.object.read` won't be available for any tier other than enterprise as custom objects is only available in enterprise.
